description.narrative: Children and families in affected areas are protected from negative effect of humanitarian crisis on their health and nutrition status, which contributes to Child Health, Health And Emergencies, Immunization, Nutrition And Emergencies, Polio Eradication, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The Government of Ukraine's response to cthe conflict in Eastern Ukraine is supported through interventions in Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH), Child Protection, Education and Health sectors
